department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Temporary help services for federal government departments and agencies within Saskatchewan and Red Deer.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME,To be eligible for Standing Offer, offerors must identify their business location and/or field location and provide a detailed description of all services offered.
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer: Temporary Help Services
#### Official Title
EW479-212626F Temporary Help Services – SK and Red Deer

#### Solicitation Number
WS4284673133

#### Tender Progress
- **Status:** Expiré (Expired)
- **Notice Type:** Demande d'offre à commandes (Request for Standing Offer)
- **Method of Procurement:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)

#### Procurement Details
- **Geographic Regions:** Alberta, Regina, Prince Albert, Saskatoon
- **Trade Agreements:** Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) et Accord de Partenariat transpacifique global et progressiste (PTPGP)
- **Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
- **Contract End Date:** 204-05-31

#### Description of Goods/Services
Temporary help services are required for federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work.

#### Amendments and Updates
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-01
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-15 14:00:00 EST (Note: Please disregard previous posting and CanadaBuys posting closing times)

#### Selection Criteria
Variations or combinations of the above methods

#### Contracting Entity and End User Entity
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information
- **Name:** Melanie Perrin, PSPC
- **Email:** melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17876658?extsite=MTc4NzY2NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Note:** Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on November 15, 2023 will be declared non-responsive.  Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission on time. You may contact Melanie Perrin for clarification on the specifications.

##### Annexes:
Please refer to the Annex A Statement of Work for the regions of service and requirements.

Note:

- ANNEX A: Statement of Work
- ANNEX B: Instructions to Tenderers
- ANNEX C
